description: This table stores the documented reasons why a biopsy was repeated.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BIOPSY_REPEAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason category ID for the reason to repeat a biopsy.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Insufficient sample


Discordance


Cellular atypia


Ductal atypia


Radial scar
